root.name: Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme VS.
root.description: OverviewMobile Suit Gundam: Extreme VS. is the eighth game in the Gundam VS series. It is the first HD entry in the franchise, running on Namco's PS3-based System 357 arcade board (the same board used by Tekken 6).Gameplay ChangesExtreme Burst works similarly to the Awaken systems of earlier games in the series: after the EX gauge is filled, the player can press ABC to activate a power-up for a limited time. Additionally, NEXT Dash (now Extreme Action) can no longer cancel melee. The ability to call a Mobile Assist is now character-specific. A new cost tier, 2500, has been added.Featured MSMobile Suit GundamGundam ( Amuro Ray) - 2000Char Custom Gelgoog ( Char Aznable) - 2000Zeong ( Char Aznable ) - 2000Acguy (Akahana) - 1000Mobile Suit Gundam MS Igloo [NEW]Zudah (Jean-Luc Duvall) -
